TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed ItemEvents_10_ReadCompleteEventHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Sub ItemEvents_10_ReadCompleteEventHandler(ByRef Cancel As Boolean)

param.name: Cancel
param.span: 如果发生事件，则为 False。
如果事件过程将此参数设置为True，则不完成读取的操作，并且阅读窗格或检查器中不显示项目。

span.span: If the event procedure sets this argument to True, the read operation is not completed and the item is not displayed in the Reading Pane or inspector.

summary.span: 这是针对相应对象中的事件的委派。在对事件实现回调方法后，使用此委派将回调方法连接到该事件。如果存在多个版本的事件接口，此委派将为指定版本的 Outlook 中的事件连接回调方法。

span.span: This is a delegate for an event in the corresponding object. After implementing a callback method for the event, use this delegate to connect the callback method to the event. If there are multiple versions of the event interface, this delegate connects the callback method for the event in the specified version of Outlook.
